Posted By: Atali (3/16/2012 12:45:47 AM)

posts.post_content:
Well it is a horrible card, but.... there are ways to combo it. :)  
First, it gives you hellbent, instantly. And when someone plays mass removal and you need cards again, you get the cards back. :) Also, you could play this guy, and then cards which want you to discard your hand as a cost. ^^ Or you play him at instant speed when someone is about to make you discard.  
  
Still a bad card. :)
posts.html:

Still a bad card. :)

Posted By: Buderus (6/5/2011 2:04:12 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
That's at least ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol) too much unfortunately.  
The drawback really is huge - on blue mage standards, an empty mind is even [comparable to death](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=24594) :D  
  
I'd have liked a Mini-*Wormfang Behemoth* with a small variant of the drawback though:  
A or 2/1 for ![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol) for example that requires you to exile a single card in your hand would have been really cool!  
(And just imagine the synergy to cards like [Lion's Eye Diamond](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lion's Eye Diamond) or [Fastbond](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fastbond) :P)
posts.html:
That's at least too much unfortunately.
The drawback really is huge - on blue mage standards, an empty mind is even comparable to death :D

I'd have liked a Mini-Wormfang Behemoth with a small variant of the drawback though:
A or 2/1 for for example that requires you to exile a single card in your hand would have been really cool!
(And just imagine the synergy to cards like Lion's Eye Diamond or Fastbond :P)

posts.post_content:
Correct me if I'm wrong.  
I have [Teferi, Mage of Zhalfir](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=244667) and [Tomoya the Revealer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tomoya the Revealer) out.  
I use Tomoyas ability and before it resolves I cast Wormfang Behemot as instant. The result is a new hand with the same number of cards(1 less). Without Teferi I couldn't get it in the right order to have a hand and Wormfang Behemot out.  
But I don't think the extra 5 Mana would be worth it :-/
posts.html:
